dashboard.query: SELECT AVG(total_cents), SUM(total_cents), SUM(labor_sold_sec), COUNT(total_cents), SUM(labor_total_cents), SUM(parts_total_cents), SUM(parts_actual_cost_cents), SUM(parts_profit_cents), SUM(labor_actual_sec), SUM(labor_actual_cost_cents), SUM(labor_profit_cents), SUM(eff_labor_hourly_rate), SUM(sublet_total_cents), SUM(sublet_actual_cost_cents), SUM(sublet_profit_cents), SUM(labor_discounted_cents), SUM(parts_discounted_cents), SUM(sublet_discounted_cents), SUM(other_discounted_cents), SUM(tax_paid_cents), SUM(other_sold_price_cents) FROM repair_orders WHERE order_status='CLOSED' and partner_id=? and location_id=? and (total_cents != 0 or labor_actual_cost_cents != 0 or parts_actual_cost_cents != 0 or sublet_actual_cost_cents != 0) and closed_day between '2016-01-01' and '2016-11-30'

SELECT extract(YEAR_MONTH from ro.closed_day) as yearmonth, count(distinct(ro.closed_day)), AVG(ro.total_cents), SUM(ro.total_cents), SUM(ro.labor_sold_sec), COUNT(ro.total_cents), SUM(ro.labor_total_cents), SUM(ro.labor_actual_sec), SUM(ro.labor_actual_cost_cents), SUM(ro.labor_profit_cents), SUM(ro.eff_labor_hourly_rate), SUM(ro.parts_total_cents), SUM(ro.parts_actual_cost_cents), SUM(ro.parts_profit_cents), SUM(ro.sublet_total_cents), SUM(ro.sublet_actual_cost_cents), SUM(ro.sublet_profit_cents), SUM(ro.labor_discounted_cents), SUM(ro.parts_discounted_cents), SUM(sublet_discounted_cents), SUM(ro.other_discounted_cents), SUM(case when c.first_seen < subdate(ro.closed, interval 1 year) then 0 else 1 end) as count_cust_new, SUM(case when c.first_seen < subdate(ro.closed, interval 1 year) then 1 else 0 end) as count_cust_ret, SUM(case when ro.order_status = 'DECLINED' then 1 else 0 end) as count_declined, SUM(ro.tax_paid_cents), SUM(ro.other_sold_price_cents) FROM repair_orders ro, customers c WHERE order_status='CLOSED' and ro.customer_id=c.id and ro.partner_id=? and (ro.total_cents != 0 or ro.labor_actual_cost_cents != 0 or ro.parts_actual_cost_cents != 0 or ro.sublet_actual_cost_cents != 0) and ro.closed_day between '2015-01-03' and '2016-12-03' and ro.location_id=? GROUP BY yearmonth asc

SELECT extract(DAY from ro.closed_day) as day, AVG(ro.total_cents), SUM(ro.total_cents), SUM(ro.labor_sold_sec), COUNT(ro.total_cents), SUM(ro.labor_total_cents), SUM(ro.labor_actual_sec), SUM(ro.labor_actual_cost_cents), SUM(ro.labor_profit_cents), SUM(ro.eff_labor_hourly_rate), SUM(ro.parts_total_cents), SUM(ro.parts_actual_cost_cents), SUM(ro.parts_profit_cents), SUM(ro.sublet_total_cents), SUM(ro.sublet_actual_cost_cents), SUM(ro.sublet_profit_cents), SUM(ro.labor_discounted_cents), SUM(ro.parts_discounted_cents), SUM(ro.sublet_discounted_cents), SUM(ro.other_discounted_cents), SUM(case when c.first_seen < subdate(ro.closed, interval 1 year) then 0 else 1 end) as count_cust_new, SUM(case when c.first_seen < subdate(ro.closed, interval 1 year) then 1 else 0 end) as count_cust_ret, SUM(case when ro.order_status = 'DECLINED' then 1 else 0 end) as count_declined, SUM(ro.tax_paid_cents), SUM(ro.other_sold_price_cents) FROM repair_orders ro, customers c WHERE order_status='CLOSED' and ro.customer_id=c.id and ro.partner_id=? and (ro.total_cents != 0 or ro.labor_actual_cost_cents != 0 or ro.parts_actual_cost_cents != 0 or ro.sublet_actual_cost_cents != 0) and ro.closed_day between '2016-11-01' and '2016-11-30' and ro.location_id=? GROUP BY day asc

dashboard.query: SELECT FROM cargly.server.persistent.shops.SRepairOrder WHERE partnerId == partnerIdParam && locationId == locationIdParam && orderStatus == 'CLOSED' && closedDay < startDateParam && (totalSoldPriceCents != 0 || laborActualCostCents != 0 || partsActualCostCents != 0 || subletActualCostCents != 0) && closedDay >= endDateParam PARAMETERS long partnerIdParam, long locationIdParam, java.util.Date startDateParam, java.util.Date endDateParam ORDER BY closed desc RANGE 0,40

select extract(YEAR_MONTH from ro.closed_day) yearmonth, e.fullName, count(ro.id), sum(ro.total_cents), sum(ro.tax_paid_cents), sum(ro.labor_total_cents), sum(ro.labor_actual_cost_cents), sum(ro.labor_profit_cents), sum(ro.parts_total_cents), sum(ro.parts_actual_cost_cents), sum(ro.parts_profit_cents), sum(ro.sublet_total_cents), sum(ro.sublet_actual_cost_cents), sum(ro.sublet_profit_cents), sum(ro.labor_discounted_cents), sum(ro.parts_discounted_cents),sum(ro.sublet_discounted_cents), sum(ro.other_discounted_cents), sum(ro.other_sold_price_cents) from repair_orders ro inner join employees e on ro.writer_id=e.id where ro.partner_id=:partnerId and ro.location_id=:locationId and ro.order_status='CLOSED' and ro.closed_day between :from and :to group by yearmonth, e.fullName order by yearmonth

select extract(YEAR_MONTH from ro.closed_day) yearmonth, e.fullName, count(l.id), sum(l.sold_cents), sum(l.actual_cost_cents), sum(l.actual_sec), sum(l.sold_sec) from repair_orders ro inner join labor l on l.order_id=ro.id inner join employees e on l.tech_id=e.id where ro.partner_id=:partnerId and ro.location_id=:locationId and ro.order_status='CLOSED' and ro.closed_day between :from and :to group by yearmonth, e.fullName order by yearmonth

select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(last_seen, INTERVAL 13 MONTH),'%Y%m'), count(*) as month from customers c  where c.partner_id=? and c.location_id=?  group by DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(last_seen, INTERVAL 13 MONTH),'%Y%m') getActiveForMonth: SQL: select count(*) from (select c.id, count(*) as total from customers c inner join repair_orders ro on ro.customer_id=c.id where c.partner_id=? and c.location_id=?  and ro.closed_day between ? and ? group by c.id) t

select extract(YEAR_MONTH from closed_day) yearmonth, marketing_source, count(*) as total from repair_orders where partner_id=:partnerId and location_id=:locationId and closed_day between :from and :to and marketing_source is not null group by yearmonth, marketing_source order by yearmonth

select * from (select v.id as vid,c.id as cid, count(ro.id) as v_ro_ct,sum(ro.total_cents) as v_total_spent, ro.marketing_source as marketing_source, lastSpent.total_cents as v_last_spent , avg(ro.total_cents) as v_avg_spent, sum(ro.labor_total_cents) as v_total_labor_spent,sum(ro.parts_total_cents) as v_total_parts_spent, csum.total_customer_visits as c_ro_ct,csum.total_customer_spent as c_total_spent,csum.avg_customer_spent as c_avg_spent,csum.vehicle_count as c_veh_ct from repair_orders ro left join vehicles v on v.id=ro.vehicle_id left join customers c on c.id=ro.customer_id left join (select customer_id,count(customer_id) as total_customer_visits,sum(total_cents) as total_customer_spent, avg(total_cents) as avg_customer_spent,count(distinct vehicle_id) as vehicle_count from repair_orders where partner_id=:partnerId and location_id=:locationId group by customer_id) csum on csum.customer_id=ro.customer_id left join ( select ls.total_cents, ls.vehicle_id from repair_orders ls where ls.partner_id=:partnerId and ls.location_id=:locationId and ls.closed in (select max(closed) as closed from repair_orders where partner_id=:partnerId and location_id=:locationId and customer_id = ls.customer_id and vehicle_id = ls.vehicle_id) group by vehicle_id ,customer_id) lastSpent on ro.vehicle_id = lastSpent.vehicle_id where ro.partner_id=:partnerId and ro.location_id=:locationId and c.last_seen>= '2014-01-01' and c.last_seen< '2014-02-01' group by cid order by ro.customer_id limit 0, 5000) vehq group by cid limit 0, 5000
